Key Match Events: West Indies won by 7 wickets with 13 balls remaining in the 1st T20I
West Indies won by 30 runs in the 2nd T20I
West Indies won by 8 wickets with 22 balls remaining (DLS Method) in the 3rd T20I
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 1st T20I was played at Brian Lara Cricket Academy, Tarouba
The 2nd and 3rd T20Is were also played at Brian Lara Cricket Academy, Tarouba
